meta.footerText: Empowering NEB students with high-quality, structured, and accessible digital notes.

hero.title: Excellence in Education starts with the right notes.
hero.subtitle: Premium, structured, and curriculum-aligned notes for English, Nepali, and Computer Science. Designed for top-performing students in Nepal.

features.feature1Desc: Optimized for speed. No lag, no bloat. Just pure knowledge delivered instantly.
features.feature2Desc: Strictly based on the latest NEB syllabus for Class 11 and 12.
features.feature3Desc: Study anywhere, anytime. Perfectly adapted for all device sizes.

hero.title: About LearnNepal
hero.subtitle: We are a team of educators dedicated to digitizing education in Nepal.

content.mission: To provide free, high-quality educational resources to every student in Nepal.
content.vision: A future where quality education is accessible to everyone, regardless of location.
